name: Annan Samaat: Between Night & Day
description:
The Stars fell into the Sea

As the great cosmic manta ray Annan-Samaat, swim through the seas of night to pick up the stars that fell from heaven; then jump and soar into the skies, to put them back where they belong! As you do so, slowly bring the world back to life.

Controls

Use your mouse to guide Annan-Samaat.
Click to dash.
To fly higher, gain speed first by diving and dashing.

Credits

  • Baptiste Lalue - 2D Artist
  • Gregory Chicoine - Game & Level Designer
  • Daariv MISK - 2D Artist
  • fae.exe - Game & Narrative Designer
  • MiiisterB- Game Developer
  • Shertigan - Sound Designer, Composer
